title.value: Transforms a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse (ehealth-questionnaireresponse profile) resource to a DK-HL7 Questionnaire Response Document (QRD) XML document. The input FHIR Bundle contains FHIR Composition (ehealth-composition profile) resource referencing a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse (ehealth-documentreference profile) resource. The returned FHIR DocumentReference contains the QRD XML document adhering to the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Response Document profile.

description.value: Transforms a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse (ehealth-questionnaireresponse profile) resource to a DK-HL7 Questionnaire Response Document (QRD) XML document. The input FHIR Bundle contains FHIR Composition (ehealth-composition profile) resource referencing a FHIR QuestionnaireResponse (ehealth-documentreference profile) resource. The returned FHIR DocumentReference contains the QRD XML document adhering to the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Response Document profile.
